content.rendered:
Directed by Hugh Laurie.

Written by Hugh Laurie.

Cast Lucy Boynton (Frankie Derwent). Maeve Dermody (Moira Nicholson). Daniel Ings (Roger Bassington-ffrench). Jonathan Jules (Ralph ‘Knocker’ Beadon). Alistair Petrie (Rev. Richard Jones). Nicholas Asbury (Mr. Angel). Morwenna Banks (Amelia Cayman). Richard Dixon (Leo Cayman). Christian Patterson (Sergeant Ellis). Nia Trussler Jones (Gladys Roberts). Benedict Wolf (Hari Singh). Miles Jupp (Henry Bassington-ffrench). Amy Nuttall (Sylvia Bassington-ffrench). Paul Whitehouse (Askew). Patrick Barlow (Wilfred Bragge). Joshua James (Dr. George Arbuthnot). Hugh Laurie (Dr. James Nicholson). Leon Ockenden (Alex Pritchard). Nicholas Banks (‘Thicko’ Derwent-Broxley). Carlie Enoch (Ivy Marshall). Rufus Bateman (Tommy Bassington-ffrench). Conleth Hill (Dr. Alwyn Thomas). Emma Thompson (Lady Marcham). Jim Broadbent (Lord Marcham). Bob Goody (Ted Miller). Trevor Cooper (Coroner). Maggie McCarthy (Mrs. Connolly). Tim Treloar (Arthur Crowe). Timothy Harker (Porter). Martyn Ellis (Albert Golf Pro). Dan Tetsell (Ticket Collector).

Language English.

Producers Basi Akpabio. Veronica Castillo. Claire Jones. Jonathan Karas. James Prichard. Damien Timmer. Andrew Wood. Helen Ziegler. Gina Cronk. Hugh Laurie. Emily Powers.

Production Agatha Christie Productions. Mammoth Screen.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 3

Status Finished (4)
